quote: Are we going to be friends forever?’ Asked Piglet. ‘Even longer,’ Pooh answered.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Growing apart doesn’t change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled.
author: Ally Condie

quote: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication.
author: Anna Deavere Smith

quote: We’ll be friend ’til we’re old and senile. … Then we’ll be new friends!
author: Anonymous

quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: She’s always there for me when I need her; She’s my best friend; she’s just my everything.
author: Ashley Olsen

quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes heart warm.
author: Augustine Birrell

quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: Be slow in choosing a friend, slower in changing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: What do you do with your best friend? You do nothing.
author: Blake Lively

quote: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn’t.
author: Brooke Elliott

quote: We have been friends together in sunshine and in shade.
author: Caroline Sheridan Norton

quote: A man’s friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: My best friend is me, and I take good care of me.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them…your smile, your hope, and your courage.
author: Doe Zantamata

quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
author: Doug Larson

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: There is one friend in the life of each of us who seems not a separate person, however dear and beloved, but an expansion, an interpretation, of one’s self, the very meaning of one’s soul.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: When a man’s best friend is his dog… That dog has a problem.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: I felt it shelter to speak to you.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
author: Emily Kimbrough

quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.
author: Epicurus

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
author: Euripides

quote: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another.
author: Eustace Budgell

quote: Friends are relatives you make for yourself.
author: Eustache Deschamps

quote: Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same.
author: Flavia Weedn

quote: A friend can tell you things you don’t want to tell yourself.
author: Frances Ward Weller

quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them.
author: Francesco Guicciardini

quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
author: George Herbert

quote: If instead of a gem, or even a flower, we should cast the gift of a loving thought into the heart of a friend, that would be giving as the angels give.
author: George MacDonald

quote: A true friend is forever a friend.
author: George MacDonald, The Marquis of Lossie

quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
author: George Washington

quote: It’s not that diamonds are a girl’s best friend, but it’s your best friends who are your diamonds. It’s your best friends who are supremely resilient, made under pressure and of astonishing value. They’re everlasting; they can cut glass if they need to.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: A friend is the one who comes in when the whole world has gone out.
author: Grace Pulpit

quote: A true friend reaches for your hand and touches your heart.
author: Heather Pryor

quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Ah, how good it feels! The hand of an old friend.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
author: Herodotus

quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: A good friend is like a fourleaf clover; hard to find and lucky to have.
author: Irish Proverb

quote: No man is a failure who has friends.
author: It’s a Wonderful Life

quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone

quote: I’ve known my best friend since I was a baby, and I don’t know what I would do without her. She is always straight with me and can make me laugh hysterically. Everyone should have someone like that in their life.
author: Jasmine Guinness

quote: Friends are the family you choose.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
author: John Churton Collins

quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
author: John Leonard

quote: If you wanna find out who’s a true friend, screw up or go through a challenging time… Then see who sticks around.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: I always felt that the great high privilege, relief and comfort of friendship was that one had to explain nothing.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: That was the thing about best friends. Like sisters and mothers, they could piss you off and make you cry and break your heart, but in the end, when the chips were down, they were there, making you laugh even in your darkest hours.
author: Kristin Hannah

quote: That was what a best friend did: hold up a mirror and show you your heart.
author: Kristin Hannah

quote: We all know what it feels like to be an outcast or a loner or to fall between the cracks. To be the target of gossip or people talking about you, or girls are ganging up on you. One minute, they’re your best friend; the next, they call you on threeway.
author: Krysten Ritter

quote: A bosom friend an intimate friend, you know a really kindred spirit to whom I can confide my inmost soul.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he’d rather be anywhere else.
author: Len Wein

quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
author: Linda Grayson

quote: A good friend is a connection to lif— a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
author: Lois Wyse

quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Are we not like two volumes of one book?
author: Marceline DesbordesValmore

quote: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck, Answer Without Ceasing

quote: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.
author: Maria Shriver

quote: Every friendship goes through ups and downs. Dysfunctional patterns set in; external situations cause internal friction; you grow apart and then bounce back together.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: If we treated ourselves as well as we treated our best friend, can you imagine?
author: Meghan Markle

quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
author: Mencius

quote: Best friends can turn a horrible day, into one of the best days of your life.
author: Nathanael Richmond

quote: True friends are like diamonds—bright, beautiful, valuable, and always in style.
author: Nicole Richie

quote: Hold a true friend with both your hands.
author: Nigerian Proverb

quote: No friendship is an accident.
author: O. Henry

quote: True friends stab you in the front.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.
author: Plautus

quote: I don’t need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
author: Plutarch

quote: A sweet friendship refreshes the soul.
author: Proverbs 27:9

quote: Ooh you’re the best friend that I ever had. I’ve been with you such a long time. You’re my sunshine and I want you to know. That my feelings are true. I really love you. Oh you’re my best friend.
author: Queen

quote: A true friend is someone who will always love you—the imperfect, the confused, the wrong youbecause that is what people are supposed to do.
author: R. J. L.

quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, not the kindly smile, nor the joy of companionship; it is the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when you discover that someone else believes in you and is willing to trust you with a friendship.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Picking a best friend who stands up for what she believes in, is true to herself and allows you to be yourself without judgement of how ‘cool’ you are? Well, now you’re picking a friend for life.
author: Renee Olstead

quote: The biggest ingredient in a best friend is someone whose actions you respect and who you can truly be yourself around.
author: Renee Olstead

quote: Your friends will know you better in the first minute you meet than your acquaintances will know you in a thousand years.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Friends are like stars, they come and go, but the ones that stay are the ones that glow.
author: Roxy Quiksilver

quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Friends are the sailors who guide your rickety boat safely across the dangerous waters of life.
author: Sare and Cate

quote: You can’t describe your best friends in words. You can describe them with memories that you had with them.
author: Saurabh Saini

quote: The great thing about new friends is that they bring new energy to your soul.
author: Shanna Rodriguez

quote: How many slams in an old screen door? Depends how loud you shut it. How many slices in a bread? Depends how thin you cut it. How much good inside a day? Depends how good you live ’em. How much love inside a friend? Depends how much you give ’em.
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: Only a true friend would be that truly honest.
author: Shrek

quote: Only your real friends will tell you when your face is dirty.
author: Sicilian Proverb

quote: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Friends are medicine for a wounded heart, and vitamins for a hopeful soul.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: A good friend will help you move, but a true friend will help you move a body.
author: Steven J. Daniels

quote: I never had any friends later on like the ones I had when I was 12.
author: Steven King, Stand by Me

quote: The rules of friendship are tacit, unconscious; they are not rational. In business, though, you have to think rationally.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: Friendship my definition is built on two things. Respect and trust. Both elements have to be there. And it has to be mutual. You can have respect for someone, but if you don’t have trust, the friendship will crumble.
author: Stieg Larsson

quote: Shared joy is a double joy; shared sorrow is half a sorrow.
author: Swedish proverb

quote: There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Friends make you smile. Best friends make you giggle ’til you pee your pants.
author: Terri Guillemets

quote: I get by with a little help from my friends.
author: The Beatles

quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: You’ve got a friend in me.
author: Toy Story

quote: Friendship is a pretty fulltime occupation if you really are friendly with somebody. You can’t have too many friends because then you’re just not really friends.
author: Truman Capote

quote: No road is long with good company.
author: Turkish Proverb

quote: A best friend is like a fourleaf clover: hard to find and lucky to have.
author: Unknown

quote: A best friend is someone who makes you laugh even when you think you’ll never smile again.
author: Unknown

quote: A friend accepts us as we are yet helps us to be what we should.
author: Unknown

quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
author: Unknown

quote: A friend is someone who understand your past, believes in your future, and accepts you today just the way you are.
author: Unknown

quote: A strong friendship doesn’t need daily conversation and doesn’t always need togetherness. As long as the relationship lives in the heart, true friends will never part.
author: Unknown

quote: A true friend is one who thinks you are a good egg even if you are halfcracked.
author: Unknown

quote: Best friend isn’t just a name. A best friend is someone who’s there for you, no matter what. You can trust them, with anything and everything. Best friends share tears and laughs, almost like their emotions are intertwined. Most importantly, you can always count on a best friend.
author: Unknown

quote: Best friend: someone you can only stay mad at for so long because you have important things to talk about.
author: Unknown

quote: Best friends don’t necessarily have to talk every day. They don’t even need to talk for weeks. But when they do, it’s like they never stopped talking.
author: Unknown

quote: Best friends make the good times better and the hard times easier.
author: Unknown

quote: Best friends: it’s a promise, not a label.
author: Unknown

quote: Best friends? Well, I guess you could call us that but I think we are more like sisters.
author: Unknown

quote: Besties before testes.
author: Unknown

quote: F.R.I.E.N.D.S. Fight for you. Respect you. Include you. Encourage you. Need you. Deserve you. Stand by you.
author: Unknown

quote: Friends are kisses blown to us by angels.
author: Unknown

quote: Friends are like walls. Sometimes you lean on them, and sometimes it’s good just knowing they are there.
author: Unknown

quote: Friends listen to what you say. Best friends listen to what you don’t say.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is like a rainbow between two hearts.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship isn’t a big thing. It’s a million little things.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship isn’t about who you’ve known the longest, it’s about who walked in to your life, said ‘I’m here for you’ and PROVED it.
author: Unknown

quote: If you’re alone, I’ll be your shadow. If you want to cry, I’ll be your shoulder. If you want a hug, I’ll be your pillow. If you need to be happy, I’ll be your smile. But anytime you need a friend, I’ll just be me.
author: Unknown

quote: Let’s swear each with our pinky. We’ll be the best of friends. Until we are old and wrinkly!
author: Unknown

quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing compares to the pain of a belly ache from laughing too hard with your best friend.
author: Unknown

quote: Sitting silently beside a friend who is hurting may be the best gift we can give.
author: Unknown

quote: Soulmates are people who bring out the best in you. They are not perfect but are always perfect for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Talking to your best friend is sometimes all the therapy you need.
author: Unknown

quote: The best kind of friend is the one you could sit on a porch with, never saying a word, and walk away feeling like that was the best conversation you’ve had.
author: Unknown

quote: There are big ships and small ships. But the best ship of all is friendship.
author: Unknown

quote: Want to see who your real friends are? Screw up and see who’s still there.
author: Unknown

quote: When it hurts to look back, and you’re afraid to look ahead, you can look beside you and your best friend will be there.
author: Unknown

quote: Yesterday brought the beginning, tomorrow brings the end, and somewhere in the middle we became the best of friends.
author: Unknown

quote: You can always tell when two people are best friends because they are having more fun than it makes sense for them to be having.
author: Unknown

quote: A friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.
author: Unknown​

quote: You know, real life doesn’t just suddenly resolve itself. You have to keep working at it. Democracy, marriage, friendship. You can’t just say, ‘She’s my best friend.’ That’s not a given, it’s a process.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: Some people go to priests, others to poetry, I to my friends.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
author: Waqar Ahmed

quote: There are no rules for friendship. It must be left to itself. We cannot force it any more than love.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: A true friend unbosoms freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
author: William Penn

quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Words are easy, like the wind; Faithful friends are hard to find.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Oh, you’re the best friends anybody ever had. And it’s funny, but I feel as if I’d known you all the time, but I couldn’t have, could I?
author: Wizard of Oz

quote: What we wait around a lifetime for with one person, we can find in a moment with someone else.
author: Stephanie Klein

quote: When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: For the two of us, home isn’t a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
author: Stephanie Perkins

quote: It’s probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your ex-boyfriend because he’s absolutely lethal.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
author: Hugh Mackay

quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that’s it.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can’t figure out what from.
author: Mae West

quote: Maybe our girlfriends are our soulmates and guys are just people to have fun with.
author: Candace Bushnell

quote: Relationships dont always make sense. Especially from the outside
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: Come sleep with me: We won’t make Love,Love will make us.
author: Julio Cortázar

quote: When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them.
author: Bill Maher

quote: Love is no assignment for cowards.
author: Ovid

quote: A dame that knows the ropes isn’t likely to get tied up.
author: Mae West

quote: There is greatness in doing something you hate for the sake of someone you love.
author: Shmuley Boteach

quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
author: Emily Kimbrough

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
author: Donald Miller

quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
author: Henry Winkler

quote: A man who marries a woman to educate her falls victim to the same fallacy as the woman who marries a man to reform him.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Being married is like having somebody permanently in your corner. It feels limitless, not limited.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Sometimes we know who we want to be and what we want to do long… long before we know how to get there.
author: Patti Callahan Henry

quote: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
author: Doménico Cieri Estrada

quote: You Can’t Lose Something You Never Had
author: Kate Hudson

quote: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.
author: Cornel West

quote: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

quote: The best way to remember your wife’s birthday is to forget it once.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Marriage is three parts love and seven parts forgiveness of sins.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: It’s no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn’t even speak to each other if they met at a party.
author: Nick Hornby

quote: Trouble is part of your life, and if you don’t share it, you don’t give the person who loves you enough chance to love you enough.
author: Dinah Shore

quote: The purpose of a relationship is not to have another who might complete you, but to have another with whom you might share your completeness.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
author: Emily Kimbrough

quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Relationships, marriages are ruined where one person continues to learn, develop and grow and the other person stands still.
author: Catherine Pulsifer

quote: The extent to which two people in a relationship can bring up and resolve issues is a critical marker of the soundness of a relationship.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
author: Barbara Johnson

quote: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: A relationship requires a lot of work and commitment.
author: Greta Scacchi

quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Real giving is when we give to our spouses what’s important to them, whether we understand it, like it, agree with it, or not.
author: Michele Weiner-Davis

quote: Having someone wonder where you are when you don’t come home at night is a very old human need.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Any husband who says, “My wife and I are completely equal partners,” is talking about either a law firm or a hand of bridge.
author: ”–  Bill Cosby

quote: You don’t develop courage by being happy in your relationships everyday. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
author: Epicurus

quote: When you don’t talk, there’s a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said.
author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock, Dairy Queen

quote: The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but to hold hands.
author: Alexandra Penney

quote: A woman laughing is a woman conquered.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The intense happiness of our union is derived in a high degree from the perfect freedom with which we each follow and declare our own impressions.
author: George Eliot

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Bernard M. Maruch

quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it’s better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don’t hide the madness.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: Faithless To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: About all you can do in life is be who you are. Some people will love you for you. Most will love you for what you can do for them, and some won’t like you at all.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Be yourself, don’t take anything from anyone, and never let them take you alive.
author: Gerard Way

quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.
author: Philip Pullman

quote: You are you. Now, isn’t that pleasant?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Art and life really are the same, and both can only be about a spiritual journey, a path towards a re-union with a supreme creator, with god, with the divine; and this is true no matter how unlikely, how strange, how unorthodox, one’s particular life path might appear to one’s self or others at any given moment.
author: Genesis P-Orridge

quote: I don’t care what you think about me. I don’t think about you at all.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else.
author: Judy Garland

quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Where’s your will to be weird?
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Most people are other people.  Their thoughts are someone else’s opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you cannot be a poet, be the poem.
author: David Carradine

quote: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: There is nothing more awful, insulting, and depressing than banality.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: I will not hide my tastes or aversions. I will so trust that what is deep is holy, that I will do strongly before the sun and moon whatever only rejoices me, and the heart appoints.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Hateful to me as the gates of Hades is that man who hides one thing in his heart and speaks another.
author: Homer

quote: If you can’t love yourself, how in the hell you gonna love somebody else?
author: RuPaul

quote: They can’t scare me, if I scare them first.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Don’t be into trends. Don’t make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
author: Gianni Versace

quote: our time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: An unfulfilled vocation drains the color from a man’s entire existence.
author: Balzac

quote: When I was a child my mother said to me, ‘If you become a soldier, you’ll be a general. If you become a monk, you’ll be the pope.’ Instead I became a painter and wound up as Picasso.
author: Picasso

quote: Follow your own star!
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: You are not a bad person because you are gay. You are you because you are you and you were meant to be you so be you proudly.
author: Tegan Quin

quote: Don’t let others box you into their idea of what they think you should be. A confined identity is a miserable way to exist. Be you and live free. Trust that in living true to yourself, you will attract people that support and love you, just as you are.
author: Jaeda deWalt

quote: If you want to be yourself, sometimes you can’t compare the economic benefit with art.
author: Kelly Liang

quote: To be one, to be united is a great thing. But to respect the right to be different is maybe even greater.
author: Bono

quote: Learn to… be what you are, and learn to resign with a good grace all that you are not.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Never apologize for showing feeling.  When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: If God had wanted me otherwise, He would have created me otherwise.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: At bottom every man knows well enough that he is a unique being, only once on this earth; and by no extraordinary chance will such a marvelously picturesque piece of diversity in unity as he is, ever be put together a second time.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We all wear masks, and the time comes when we cannot remove them without removing some of our own skin.
author: Andre Berthiaume

quote: One’s real life is often the life that one does not lead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for something you are not.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Taking into account the public’s regrettable lack of taste, it is incumbent upon you not to fit in..
author: Janeane Garofalo

quote: Some people say you are going the wrong way, when it’s simply a way of your own.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: I feel that the simplicity of life is just being yourself.
author: Bobby Brown

quote: How many more of us are faking the facade? How many more of us are pretending to be something we’re not? Even better, how many of us will have the courage to be ourselves regardless of what others think?
author: Katie McGarry

quote: Don’t dilute yourself for any person or any reason. You are enough! Be unapologetically you.
author: Steve Mariboli

quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself-and especially to feel, or not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at any moment is fine with them. That’s what real love amounts to – letting a person be what he really is.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: A day wasted on others is not wasted on one’s self.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: I slept and I dreamed that life is all joy. I woke and I saw that life is all service. I served and I saw that service is joy.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: When you are able to shift your inner awareness to how you can serve others, and when you make this the central focus of your life, you will then be in a position to know true miracles in your progress toward prosperity.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Let us try to teach generosity and altruism, because we are born selfish. Let us understand what our own selfish genes are up to, because we may then at least have the chance to upset their designs, something that no other species has ever aspired to do.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Kindness is a source of relief to the soul of the giver, creating a sense of fortitude that is incomprehensible to those who do not know what kindness is all about.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: One who knows how to show and to accept kindness will be a friend better than any possession.
author: Sophocles

quote: When I was young, I used to admire intelligent people; as I grow older, I admire kind people.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: You get older and you learn there is one sentence, just four words long, and if you can say it to yourself it offers more comfort than almost any other. It goes like this: At least I tried.
author: Ann Brashares

quote: I found that every single successful person I’ve ever spoken to had a turning point and the turning point was where they made a clear, specific, unequivocal decision that they were not going to live like this anymore. Some people make that decision at 15 and some people make it at 50 and most never make it at all.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Life is really generous to those who pursue their personal legend.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: You have to chase your dreams, no matter what. The impossible just takes a little longer. One stroke at a time, one step at a time, the impossible is easy to achieve.
author: Tori Murden

quote: Don’t keep your dreams in your eyes, they may fall as tears. Keep them in your heart so that every heartbeat may remind you to convert them into reality.
author: Nishan Panway

quote: You can influence, direct and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: No one is in control of your happiness but you; therefore, you have the power to change anything about yourself or your life that you want to change.
author: Barbara de Angelis

quote: Control your thoughts. Decide about that which you will think and concentrate upon. You are in charge of your life to the degree you take charge of your thoughts.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Don’t settle. Don’t finish crappy books. If you don’t like the menu, leave the restaurant. If you’re not on the right path, get off it.
author: Chris Brogan

quote: Don’t bend; don’t water it down; don’t try to make it logical; don’t edit your own soul according to the fashion. Rather, follow your most intense obsessions mercilessly.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Our biggest fear is not in expressing the truth but that we will be attacked or belittled because of our truth.
author: Kelli Wilson

quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality…I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: In essence, you are neither inferior nor superior to anyone. True self-esteem and true humility arise out of that realization. In the eyes of the ego, self-esteem and humility are contradictory. In truth, they are one and the same.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The ideals which have always shone before me and filled me with joy are goodness, beauty, and truth.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Though sympathy alone can’t alter facts, it can help to make them more bearable.
author: Bram Stoker

quote: Besides love and sympathy, animals exhibit other qualities connected with the social instincts which in us would be called moral.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: We must laugh at man to avoid crying for him.
author: Napolean Bonaparte

quote: Reserved people often really need the frank discussion of their sentiments and griefs more than the expansive.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Woman’s fatal weakness is to desire sympathy and comprehension.
author: Ouida

quote: Could I tell them I was sorry their loved one was dead, when he’d tried to kill me? There was no rule of etiquette for this; even my grandmother would have been stymied.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: That though the radiance which was once so bright be now forever taken from my sight. Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, glory in the flower. We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: If there was less sympathy in the world, there would be less trouble in the world.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Tears are the silent language of grief.
author: Voltaire

quote: Only by joy and sorrow does a person know anything about themselves and their destiny. They learn what to do and what to avoid.
author: Goethe

quote: We understand death only after it has placed its hands on someone we love.
author: Anne L. de Stael

quote: Sympathy is two hearts tugging at one load..
author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quote: I’ve noticed that about your people, Doctor. You find it easier to understand the death of one than the death of a million. You speak about the objective hardness of the Vulcan heart, yet how little room there seems to be in yours.
author: Spock

quote: There is something very morbid about modern sympathy with pain.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
author: Dante

quote: In the land of the dying, sentences go unfinished, you know how they’re going to end.
author: Daniel Wallace

quote: When you’re riding, only the race in which you’re riding is important.
author: Bill Shoemaker

quote: Remember me with smiles and laughter, for that is how I will remember you all. If you can only remember me with tears, then don’t remember me at all.
author: Laura Ingles Wilder

quote: Excessive sorrow laughs. Excessive Joy Weeps.
author: William Blake

quote: September did not want to feel for the Marquess. That’s how villains get you, she knew. You feel badly for them, and next thing you know, you’re tied to train tracks. But her wild, untried heart opened up another bloom inside her, a dark branch heavy with fruit.
author: Catherine Valente

quote: Compassion only plagues those with hearts, much like a field of thorns only troubles those who bleed..
author: Rachelle E. Goodrich

quote: To sympathize with the suffering of others forges understanding, but that doesn’t mean they’ll put up with you.
author: Benson Bruno

quote: It is much more easy to have sympathy with suffering than it is to have sympathy with thought.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Great grief does not of itself put an end to itself.
author: Seneca

quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass; it’s about learning to dance in the rain.
author: Unknown

quote: We meet but briefly in life, if we touch each other with stardust – that is everything.
author: Unknown

quote: The gods conceal from men the happiness of death, that they may endure life.
author: Lucan

quote: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Seashells remind us that every passing life leaves something beautiful behind.
author: Unknown

quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: To die is poignantly bitter, but the idea of having to die without having lived is unbearable.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Nothing you love is lost. Not really. Things, people–they always go away sooner or later. You can’t hold them anymore than you can hold moonlight. But if they’ve touched you, if they’re inside you, then they’re still yours. The only things you ever really have are the ones you hold inside your heart.
author: Bruce Coville

quote: The light has gone out of my life.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Where there is sorrow there is holy ground.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: Life is a dream walking, death is a going home.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: We should feel sorrow, but not sink under its oppression.
author: Confucius

quote: Life is like the desert, life the solitude, death joins us to the great majority.
author: Edward Young

quote: The tragedy of life is in what dies inside a man while he lives.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: The call of death is a call of love. Death can be sweet if we answer it in the affirmative, if we accept it as one of the great eternal forms of life and transformation.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: WA person’s true wealth is the good he or she does in the world.
author: Mohammad

quote: When you’re riding, only the race in which you’re riding is important.
author: Bill Shoemaker

quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are messengers of overwhelming grief…and unspeakable love.
author: Washington Irving

quote: The world is full of suffering. It is also full of overcoming
author: Helen Keller

quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Grief knits two hearts in closer bonds than happiness ever can; and common sufferings are far stronger links than common joys.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Death – the last sleep? No, it is the final awakening.
author: Sir Walter Scott

quote: Death is the black hole of biology. It’s an event horizon, and once you go over that event horizon, no information can be passed back out of the hole.
author: Terrance McKenna

quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
author: Kalil Gibran

quote: Suicide is a privilege of man which deity does not possess.
author: Pliny the Elder

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Unknown

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The quality of a person’s life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
author: Unknown

quote: Individual commitment to a group effort, that is what makes a team work.
author: Unknown

quote: After the cheers have died down and the stadium is empty, after the headlines have been written and after you are back in the quiet of your room and the championship ring has been placed on the dresser and all the pomp and fanfare has faded, the endu.
author: Unknown

quote: Football is like life – it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
author: Unknown

quote: Once a man has made a commitment to a way of life, he puts the greatest strength in the world behind him. It’s something we call heart power. Once a man has made this commitment, nothing will stop him short of success.
author: Unknown

quote: Leaders are made, they are not born. They are made by hard effort, which is the price which all of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
author: Unknown

quote: I firmly believe that any man’s finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is the moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle, victorious.
author: Unknown

quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Leadership rests not only upon ability, not only upon capacity; having the capacity to lead is not enough. The leader must be willing to use it. His leadership is then based on truth and character. There must be truth in the purpose and will power in the character.
author: Unknown

quote: Inches make champions.
author: Unknown

quote: If you can accept losing you can’t win. If you can walk you can run. No one is ever hurt. Hurt is in your mind.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall.
author: Unknown

quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Every time a football player goes to ply his trade he’s got to play from the ground up — from the soles of his feet right up to his head. Every inch of him has to play. Some guys play with their heads. That’s OK You’ve got to be smart to be number one in any business. But more importantly, you’ve got to play with your heart, with every fiber of your body. If you’re lucky enough to find a guy with a lot of head and a lot of heart, he’s never going to come off the field second.
author: Unknown

quote: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect.
author: Unknown

quote: The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That’s real glory. That’s the essence of it.
author: Unknown

quote: If you aren’t fired up with enthusiasm, you’ll be fired with enthusiasm.
author: Unknown

quote: Life’s battles don’t always go to the stronger or faster man. But sooner or later, the man who wins is the man who thinks he can.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is contagious; so is lack of confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
author: Unknown

quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Fatigue makes cowards of us all.
author: Unknown

quote: There’s only one way to succeed in anything, and that is to give it everything. I do, and I demand that my players do.
author: Unknown

quote: Winning is not a sometime thing; it’s an all time thing. You don’t win once in a while, you don’t do things right once in a while, you do them right all the time. Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
author: Unknown

quote: There is only one way to succeed in anything and that is to give it everything.
author: Unknown

quote: Some of us will do our jobs well and some will not, but we will be judged by only one thing-the result.
author: Unknown

quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
author: Unknown

quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
author: Unknown

quote: Coaches who can outline plays on a black board are a dime a dozen. The ones who win get inside their player and motivate.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Leaders aren’t born, they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that’s the price we’ll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.
author: Unknown

quote: Leadership is based on a spiritual quality; the power to inspire, the power to inspire others to follow.
author: Unknown

quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
author: Unknown

quote: Show me a good loser, and I’ll show you a loser.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The spirit, the will to win, and the will to excel are the things that endure. These qualities are so much more important than the events that occur.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s easy to have faith in yourself and have discipline when you’re a winner, when you’re number one. What you’ve got to have is faith and discipline when you’re not yet a winner.
author: Unknown

quote: Unless a man believes in himself and makes a total commitment to his career and puts everything he has into it – his mind, his body, his heart – what’s life worth to him?
author: Unknown

quote: I would say that the quality of each man’s life is the full measure of that man’s commitment of excellence and victory – whether it be football, whether it be business, whether it be politics or government or what have you.
author: Unknown

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather in a lack of will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Football is a great deal like life in that it teaches that work, sacrifice, perseverance, competitive drive, selflessness and respect for authority is the price that each and every one of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is like anything worthwhile. It has a price. You have to pay the price to win and you have to pay the price to get to the point where success is possible. Most important, you must pay the price to stay there.
author: Unknown

quote: Once you agree upon the price you and your family must pay for success, it enables you to ignore the minor hurts, the opponent’s pressure, and the temporary failures.
author: Unknown

quote: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive, and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
author: Unknown

quote: It is essential to understand that battles are primarily won in the hearts of men.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: After all the cheers have died down and the stadium is empty, after the headlines have been written, and after you are back in the quiet of your room and the championship ring has been placed on the dresser and after all the pomp and fanfare have faded, the enduring thing that is left is the dedication to doing with our lives the very best we can to make the world a better place in which to live.
author: Unknown

quote: If you’ll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
author: Unknown

quote: They call it coaching but it is teaching. You do not just tell them…you show them the reasons.
author: Unknown

quote: Most important of all, to be successful in life demands that a man make a personal commitment to excellence and to victory, even though the ultimate victory can never be completely won. Yet that victory might be pursued and wooed with every fiber of our body, with every bit of our might and all our effort. And each week, there is a new encounter; each day, there is a new challenge.
author: Unknown

quote: Obstacles are what you see when you take your eyes off of the goal.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Morally, the life of the organization must be of exemplary nature. This is one phase where the organization must not have criticism.
author: Unknown

quote: In order to succeed, this group will need a singleness of purpose, they will need a dedication, and they will have to convince all of their prospects of the willingness to sacrifice.
author: Unknown

quote: Once you have established the goals you want and the price you’re willing to pay, you can ignore the minor hurts, the opponent’s pressure and the temporary failures.
author: Unknown

quote: Mental toughness is Spartanism, with all its qualities of self-denial, sacrifice, dedication, fearlessness, and love.
author: Unknown

quote: There is no substitute for work.
author: Unknown

quote: Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Teams do not go physically flat, they go mentally stale.
author: Unknown

quote: When we place our dependence in God, we are unencumbered, and we have no worry. In fact, we may even be reckless, insofar as our part in the production is concerned. This confidence, this sureness of action, is both contagious and an aid to the perfect action. The rest is in the hands of God – and this is the same God, gentlemen, who has won all His battles up to now.
author: Unknown

quote: I’ve never known a man worth his salt who, in the long run, deep down in his heart, didn’t appreciate the grind, the discipline.
author: Unknown

quote: The good Lord gave you a body that can stand most anything. It’s your mind you have to convince.
author: Unknown

quote: There are three things that are important to every man in this locker room. His God, his family, and the Green Bay Packers. In that order.
author: Unknown

quote: To achieve success, whatever the job we have, we must pay a price.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Mental toughness is many things and rather difficult to explain. Its qualities are sacrifice and self-denial. Also, most importantly, it is combined with a perfectly disciplined will that refuses to give in. It’s a state of mind – you could call it character in action.
author: Unknown

quote: Leadership is not just one quality, but rather a blend of many qualities; and while no one individual possesses all of the needed talents that go into leadership, each man can develop a combination to make him a leader.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is based upon a spiritual quality, a power to inspire others.
author: Unknown

quote: We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: There is only one kind of discipline, and that is the perfect discipline. As a leader, you must enforce and maintain that discipline; otherwise, you will fail at your job.
author: Unknown

quote: A leader must identify himself with the group, must back up the group, even at the risk of displeasing superiors. He must believe that the group wants from him a sense of approval. If this feeling prevails, production, discipline, morale will be high, and in return, you can demand the cooperation to promote the goals of the community.
author: Unknown

quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection, we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Second place is meaningless. You can’t always be first, but you have to believe that you should have been – that you were never beaten – that time just ran out on you.
author: Unknown

quote: No leader, however great, can long continue unless he wins battles. The battle decides all.
author: Unknown

quote: To the winner, there is 100-percent elation, 100-percent fun, 100-percent laughter; and yet the only thing left to the loser is resolution and determination.
author: Unknown

quote: Winning is a habit. Watch your thoughts, they become your beliefs. Watch your beliefs, they become your words. Watch your words, they become your actions. Watch your actions, they become your habits. Watch your habits, they become your character.
author: Unknown

quote: You defeat defeatism with confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: You never win a game unless you beat the guy in front of you. The score on the board doesn’t mean a thing. That’s for the fans. You’ve got to win the war with the man in front of you. You’ve got to get your man.
author: Unknown

quote: If you don’t think you’re a winner, you don’t belong here.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I’ve been in football all my life, gentlemen, and I don’t know whether I’m particularly qualified to be a part of anything else, except I consider it a great game, a game of many assets, by the way, and I think a symbol of what this country’s best attributes are: courage and stamina and a coordinated efficiency or teamwork.
author: Unknown

quote: There is something good in men that really yearn for discipline.
author: Unknown

quote: At many a moment on many a day, I am convinced that pro football must be a game for madmen, and I must be one of them.
author: Unknown

quote: Before I can embrace freedom, I should be aware of what duties I have.
author: Unknown

quote: If it doesn’t matter who wins or loses, then why do they keep score?
author: Unknown

quote: Individual commitment to a group effort – that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It is and has always been an American zeal to be first in everything we do, and to win…
author: Unknown

quote: I derived my strength from daily mass and communion.
author: Unknown

quote: To be successful, a man must exert an effective influence upon his brothers and upon his associates, and the degree in which he accomplishes this depends on the personality of the man. The incandescence of which he is capable. The flame of fire that burns inside of him. The magnetism which draws the heart of other men to him.
author: Unknown

quote: Live as if you were living already for the second time and as if you had acted the first time as wrongly as you are about to act now!
author: Unknown

quote: Winning is not everything – but making the effort to win is.
author: Unknown

quote: Mental toughness is essential to success.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Running a football team is no different than running any other kind of organization…
author: Unknown

quote: The objective is to win: fairly, squarely, decently, win by the rules, but still win.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t succumb to excuses. Go back to the job of making the corrections and forming the habits that will make your goal possible.
author: Unknown

quote: Teamwork is what the Green Bay Packers were all about. They didn’t do it for individual glory. They did it because they loved one another.
author: Unknown

quote: The leader can never close the gap between himself and the group. If he does, he is no longer what he must be. He must walk a tightrope between the consent he must win and the control he must exert.
author: Unknown

quote: Winning isn’t everything, it’s the only thing.
author: Unknown

quote: Getting to the final is everything, and winning is icing on the cake.
author: Unknown

quote: Brains without competitive hearts are rudderless.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: A team that thinks it’s going to lose is going to lose.
author: Unknown

quote: When you’ve got the momentum in a football game, that is a time to keep going and get it into the end zone. We want to score for America’s families.
author: Unknown

quote: Some people try to find things in this game that don’t exist but football is only two things – blocking and tackling.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is contagious and so is lack of confidence, and a customer will recognize both.
author: Unknown

quote: We know how rough the road will be, how heavy here the load will be, we know about the barricades that wait along the track, but we have see our soul ahead upon a certain goal ahead and nothing left from hell to sky shall ever turn us back.
author: Unknown

quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever — the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
author: Unknown

quote: A school without football is in danger of deteriorating into a medieval study hall.
author: Unknown

quote: Run for daylight.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: All right Mister, let me tell you what winning means… you’re willing to go longer, work harder, give more than anyone else.
author: Unknown

quote: Build for your team a feeling of oneness, of dependence on one another and of strength to be derived by unity.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m not afraid to die – it’s just that I had so much left to do in this world.
author: Unknown

quote: A disciplined person is one who follows the will of the one who gives the orders.
author: Unknown

quote: We didn’t lose the game; we just ran out of time.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I’ve been accused of lacking compassion. But that just shows I’m not without compassion.
author: Unknown

quote: I think he could coach the same way today that he did then. Obviously, he was a very dynamic person. He wanted 100% effort on every play. But he was fair. He was very demanding to play for, but professional athletes need that. They’ve been babied all their lives.
author: Tom Brown, Drafted by Lombardi in 1963

quote: He would be successful in any era. The fundamentals are constant over time. Being a professional, how you handle yourself, those messages are all still good.
author: Rob Jeter, UW-Milwaukee Basketball Coach

quote: More than any other sports figure, Vince Lombardi transformed football into a metaphor of the American experience.
author: David Maraniss

quote: A conservative is a man with two perfectly good legs who, however, has never learned how to walk forward.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: A grieving woman could sit alone on a jetty in the early morning. But not with a book in her hands.
author: Pia Juul

quote: A painting is worth a thousand confused art-gallery visitors.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quote: A person is wise if he listens to millions of advice and doesn’t implement any of it.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: A person with a sharp tongue will eventually cut themselves.
author: J. Robson Koenig

quote: A skunk is better company than a person who prides himself on being ‘frank’.
author: Robert Heinlein

quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he’d rather be anywhere else.
author: Len Wein

quote: A true friend overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
author: Doug Larson

quote: A witty saying proves nothing.
author: Voltaire

quote: A word of kindness is seldom spoken in vain, while witty sayings are as easily lost as the pearls slipping from a broken string.
author: George Dennison Prentice

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Action will destroy your procrastination.
author: Og Mandino

quote: All progress has resulted from people who took unpopular positions.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: And in the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Arguing with a fool proves there are two.
author: Doris M. Smith

quote: Ask me no questions, and I’ll tell you no fibs.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day, you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Courtship is to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
author: William Congreve

quote: Do your own thinking independently. Be the chess player, not the chess piece.
author: Ralph Charell

quote: Don’t be too timid and squeamish about your actions. All life is an experiment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Don’t worry about people stealing an idea. If it’s original, you will have to ram it down their throats.
author: Howard Aiken

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That’s why dreamers are lonely.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Every habit makes our hand more witty, and out wit more handy.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don’t laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Faced with the choice between changing one’s mind and proving that there is no need to do so, almost everyone gets busy on the proof.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Fools learn from experience. Wise men learn from the experience of others.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: Friends are like melons; shall I tell you why? To find a good one, you must one hundred try.
author: Claude Mermet

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Alva Edison

quote: He wasn’t aware of it but when he smiled he looked like an amiable bear. When he didn’t smile he didn’t look amiable.
author: Emma Goldrick

quote: He who wrestles with us, strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skills. Our antagonist is our helper.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: How you think when you lose determines how long it will be until you win.
author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quote: I don’t let go of concepts –I meet them with understanding. Then they let go of me.
author: Byron Katie

quote: I not only use all the brains I have, but all that I can borrow.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: I’m an angel. The horns are only there to hold up the halo.
author: Suzanne Wrightt

quote: I’ll go anywhere as long as it’s forward.
author: David Livingstone

quote: If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: If you tell the truth, you don’t have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you want to make enemies, try to change something.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: If you’re not failing every now and again, it’s a sign you’re not doing anything very innovative.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Intelligence is more important than strength, that is why earth is ruled by men and not by animals.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: It is not what you gather but what you scatter that tells what kind of life you have lived.
author: Helen Walton

quote: It is surprising what a man can do when he has to, and how little most men will do when they don’t have to.
author: Walter Linn

quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
author: John Leonard

quote: It’s never too late to have a happy childhood.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: It’s true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Knowledge is proud she knows so much; wisdom is humble that she knows no more.
author: William Cowper

quote: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
author: Robert J. Sawyer

quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Life can only be understood backwards, but it must be lived forward.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Maturity involves turning an insult into a feedback.
author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Never try to have the last word. You might get it.
author: Robert Heinlein

quote: No-one can make you feel inferior without your permission.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.
author: William James

quote: Oh yes? Can you identify yourself? Certainly. I’d know me anywhere.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: One man’s theology is another man’s belly laugh.
author: Robert Heinlein

quote: One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Phil Hartman was brilliant, and Dave Foley is a really funny guy. Phil Hartman was actually even funnier offstage than he was onstage because he would say nasty things. Dave Foley’s very funny, very witty guy, very quick.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: Playing it safe is the riskiest choice we can ever make.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Pretending to care what men think is an art. It takes moments to learn, but lifetimes to master. I’d like to believe I’m an expert.
author: Dennis Sharpe

quote: Pride only helps us to be generous; it never makes us so, any more than vanity makes us witty.
author: George Eliot

quote: Rhetoric abounds in the cemeteries of reason.
author: Miguel Queah

quote: So just let me deal with it, I can be emotionally flawed and still love you all at the same time. I’m a great multitasker.
author: Holly Hood

quote: Some fellows get credit for being conservative when they are only stupid.
author: Kim Hubbard

quote: The advantage of growing up with siblings is that you become very good at fractions.
author: Robert Brault

quote: The best computer is a man, and it’s the only one that can be mass-produced by unskilled labor.
author: Wernher von Braun

quote: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself, and you are the easiest person to fool.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make a mistake.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don’t know anything about.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The important thing to remember is not to forget.
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: The liar’s punishment is not in the least that he is not believed, but that he cannot believe anyone else.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The man who does not read books has no advantage over the man that can not read them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The measure of success is not whether you have a tough problem to deal with, but whether it’s the same problem you had last year.
author: John Foster Dulles

quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The problem human beings face is not that we aim too high and fail, but that we aim too low and succeed.
author: Michelangelo

quote: The problem with a life spent reading is you know too much.
author: Josh Lanyon

quote: The reward of a thing done well is to have done it.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, and wiser people so full of doubts.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: There is an element of seduction in shoes that doesn’t exist for men. A woman can be sexy, charming, witty or shy with her shoes.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: There is never a better measure of what a person is than what he does when he’s absolutely free to choose.
author: William M. Bulger

quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: They sit there in committees day after day, And they each put in a color and it comes out gray. And we all have heard the saying, which is true as well as witty, That a camel is a horse that was designed by a committee.
author: Allan Sherman

quote: To be able to ask a question clearly is two-thirds of the way to getting it answered.
author: John Ruskin

quote: To die is poignantly bitter, but the idea of having to die without having lived is unbearable.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: To improve is to change. To be perfect is to change often.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Want to know something really subversive? Love is everything it’s cracked up to be. It’s really worth fighting for — risking everything for. And the trouble is — if you don’t risk anything, you risk even more.
author: Erica Jong

quote: We all have times when we think more effectively, and times when we should not be thinking at all.
author: Daniel Cohen

quote: We don’t see things as they are. We see them as we are.
author: Anais Nin

quote: We tend to get what we expect.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Well, don’t expect us to be too impressed. We just saw Finnick Odair in his underwear.
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: What gets measured gets managed.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: When I die cremate me so I can finally fit into something small.
author: Xondra Day

quote: Whether you think you can or think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Writers don’t get mad they get even in their novels.
author: Candace C. Bowen

quote: You can’t build a reputation on what you’re going to do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you’re alone with.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You know, you’re rather amusingly wrong.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: You will never find time for anything. You must make it.
author: Charles Buxton

quote: Christmas is a baby shower that went totally overboard.
author: Andy Borowitz

quote:
Santa Claus has the right idea. Visit people only once a year.” – Victor Borge
“My husband’s idea of getting the Christmas spirit is to become Scrooge.” – Melanie White

“There are 17 more shopping days until Christmas. So, guys, that means 16 more days till we start shopping, right?” -Conan O’Brien

“Once again, we come to the Holiday Season, a deeply religious time that each of us observes, in his own way, by going to the mall of his choice.” – Dave Barry
“Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and receipts for all major purchases.” – Bridger Winegar
“I haven’t taken my Christmas lights down. They look so nice on the pumpkin.” – Winston Spear

“At Christmas, tea is compulsory. Relatives are optional.” -Robert Godden

“This holiday season, no matter what your religion is, please take a moment to reflect on why it’s better than all the other ones.” – Guy Endore Kaiser
“The principal advantage of the non-parental lifestyle is that on Christmas Eve you need not be struck dumb by the three most terrifying words that the government allows to be printed on any product: “Some assembly required.”” – John Leo
“Nothing’s as mean as giving a little child something useful for Christmas.” – Kin Hubbard

“I once bought my kids a set of batteries for Christmas with a note on it saying, toys not included.'” -Bernard Manning

“What I like about Christmas is that you can make people forget the past with the present.” – Don Marquis
“I hate the radio this time of year because they play “All I Want For Christmas Is You” like, every other song. And that’s just not enough.” – Bridger Winegar
“Adults can take a simple holiday for Children and screw it up. What began as a presentation of simple gifts to delight and surprise children around the Christmas tree has culminated in a woman unwrapping six shrimp forks from her dog, who drew her name.” – Erma Bombeck

“The worst gift is a fruitcake. There is only one fruitcake in the entire world, and people keep sending it to each other.” -Johnny Carson

“A lovely thing about Christmas is that it’s compulsory, like a thunderstorm, and we all go through it together.” – Garrison Keillor
“I love Christmas. I receive a lot of wonderful presents I can’t wait to exchange.” – Henny Youngman
“That’s the true spirit of Christmas; people being helped by people other than me.” – Jerry Seinfeld
“Do give books – religious or otherwise – for Christmas. They’re never fattening, seldom sinful, and permanently personal.” – Lenore Hershey

“Never worry about the size of your Christmas tree. In the eyes of children, they are all 30 feet tall.” -Larry Wilde

“For Christmas this year, try giving less. Start with less attitude. There’s more than enough of that in the world as it is – and people will usually just give it back anyway!” – Anne Bristow
“I stopped believing in Santa Claus when I was six. Mother took me to see him in a department store, and he asked for my autograph.” – Shirley Temple
“Aren’t we forgetting the true meaning of Christmas. You know, the birth of Santa?” – Matt Groening

“Christmas is a time when you get homesick, even when you’re home.” -Carol Nelson

“Let me see if I’ve got this Santa business straight. You say he wears a beard, has no discernible source of income and flies to cities all over the world under cover of darkness? You sure this guy isn’t laundering illegal drug money?” – Tom Armstrong
“Who’s the bane of Santa’s life? The elf and safety officer.” – Catherine Tate
“Santa Claus wears a Red Suit, he must be a communist. And a beard and long hair, must be a pacifist. What’s in that pipe that he’s smoking?” – Arlo Guthrie

“Nothing says holiday like a cheese log.” -Ellen DeGeneres

“Christmas is a time when kids tell Santa what they want and adults pay for it. Deficits are when adults tell the government what they want and their kids pay for it.” – Richard Lamm
“Did you ever notice that life seems to follow certain patterns? Like I noticed that every year around this time, I hear Christmas music.” – Tom Sims
“The one thing women don’t want to find in their stockings on Christmas morning is their husband.” – Joan Rivers

“Mail your packages early so the post office can lose them in time for Christmas.” -Johnny Carson

“Many banks have a new kind of Christmas club in operation. The new club helps you save money to pay for last year’s gifts.” – Author Unknown
“I bought my brother some gift wrap for Christmas. I took it to the gift wrap department and told them to wrap it, but in a different print so he would know when to stop unwrapping.” – Steven Wright
“Be careful with drinking this Christmas. I got so drunk last night I found myself dancing in a cheesy bar… or, as you like to call it, delicatessen.” – Sean Hughes

“There’s nothing sadder in this world than to awake Christmas morning and not be a child.” -Erma Bombeck
